Name: Merry-Go-Round Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Fragata Green Olive or lemon zest twist.
Garnish with skewered olive or lemon zest twist.
Review: Stir this 'perfect' Martini around and then get merry.
History: Long lost classic variation on the Dry Martini.
Nutrition: One serving of Merry-Go-Round Martini contains 173 calories
